DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: Northridge quake -- An Aug . 2 story on 121 # 000 earthquakes in Southern California since the beginning of 1987 gave the wrong number of Northridge earthquake aftershocks . As of Aug . 1 , there were 9 # 222 recorded Northridge aftershocks , including 49 between magnitude 4.0 and 4.9 and eight magnitude 5.0 or stronger .
